allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Record iOS device benchmark results for direct-write optimization

iPhone 13 Pro results:
- RLWE to LWE: 307.36ms → 301.90ms \(-1.8%\)
- Total P50: 306.35ms → 297.82ms \(-2.8%\)

Direct-write optimization shows minimal impact on iOS compared to
M4 Mac \(2% vs 5-8%\). Allocation overhead is not the main bottleneck.
Next steps: cache-friendly loop reordering, SIMD, or parallelization.
EOF
\)")
Bash(RUSTFLAGS='-C target-cpu=native -C target-feature=+avx512f,+avx512bw,+avx512dq,+avx512vl' HIBP_DOWNLOAD_ON_START=tiny PIR_PROTOCOL=inspire KEYWORD_METHOD=cuckoo PORT=3000 cargo +nightly run:*)

Bash(RUSTFLAGS='-C target-cpu=native -C target-feature=+avx512f,+avx512bw,+avx512dq,+avx512vl' HIBP_FILE=/home/ubuntu/pir/hibp-sample.bin HIBP_DATASET=sample PIR_PROTOCOL=inspire-cuda KEYWORD_METHOD=cuckoo PORT=3000 CLIENT_PORT=3001 cargo +nightly run:*)

Bash(git -C /Users/greg/dev/dhamma/portal add biome.json apps/portal/app/[locale]/error.tsx apps/portal/app/components/maps/map-container.tsx apps/portal/app/components/navigation/nav-bar-shared.tsx apps/portal/app/[locale]/locations/maps/components/map-locations.tsx apps/portal/app/[locale]/os/locations/events/components/map-group-sittings.tsx apps/portal/app/[locale]/os/locations/events/utils.ts apps/portal/app/[locale]/schedule/[subDomain]/components/apply-button.test.tsx apps/portal/app/[locale]/schedule/[subDomain]/components/course-status.tsx apps/portal/jest.setup.ts apps/portal/lib/jest-matchers-result.ts)

Bash(git -C /Users/greg/dev/dhamma/portal commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Clean up all biome warnings

Replace `any` types with proper types, fix shadowed globals \(Error →
ErrorPage, Map → GoogleMap\), wrap handleLocationRequest in useCallback,
and turn off noImgElement rule since all uses are external legacy images.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/greg/dev/dhamma/portal commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add optional pre-commit lint hook with Husky

Opt-in by running `bunx husky` — not forced on install so
contributors can choose whether they want local lint checks.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/greg/dev/dhamma/portal commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update VS Code and DevContainer config for Biome

The project moved from Prettier/ESLint to Biome but the editor
config still referenced the old tooling. Swaps recommended
extensions and settings to match.
EOF
\)")
Bash(# Check for Package.resolved or similar in root or project gh api repos/Electric-Coin-Company/zashi-ios/contents/secant.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace)
Bash(# Search for Package.resolved files gh api ""repos/Electric-Coin-Company/zashi-ios/git/trees/main?recursive=1"")
Bash(# Check FFI repo gh api repos/Electric-Coin-Company/zcash-light-client-ffi)

Bash(# Check the SDK at the specific commit that resolved to 2.2.5 gh api repos/Electric-Coin-Company/zcash-swift-wallet-sdk/contents/Package.swift?ref=187753fc13d37de70d6212b953755d61af4f5f89 | jq -r ''.content'' | base64 -d)
